Body:
"""
        Tests for read_from_PDBx()
        """
atom = structure.Atom.read_from_PDBx(line, self.PDBx_fields)
assert atom.coords == pytest.approx(coordinates)
pytest.mark.parametrize('line,coordinates', ((
    'ATOM 4769  H HB   . ILE A 1 35  ? -20.422 5.104   -0.207  1.00 0.00 ? ? ? ? ? ? 277 ILE A HB   3'
    , [-20.422, 5.104, -0.207]), (
    'ATOM 18201 H HG21 . THR A 1 140 ? 11.080  -12.466 -8.977  1.00 0.00 ? ? ? ? ? ? 382 THR A HG21 8'
    , [11.08, -12.466, -8.977]), (
    'ATOM 23720 H HE2  . HIS A 1 193 ? 13.974  24.297  0.352   1.00 0.00 ? ? ? ? ? ? 435 HIS A HE2  10'
    , [13.974, 24.297, 0.352])))
